005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Supports model instance operations on assembly model instances.
015 * <p>
016 * This implementation uses underlying {@link LinkedHashMap} instances to
017 * preserve ordering.
018 *
019 * @param <MI>
020 *          the model instance Java type
021 * @param <NMI>
022 *          the named model instance Java type
023 * @param <FI>
024 *          the field instance Java type
025 * @param <AI>
026 *          the assembly instance Java type
027 */
028public abstract class AbstractContainerModelSupport<
029    MI extends IModelInstance,
030    NMI extends INamedModelInstance,
031    FI extends IFieldInstance,
032    AI extends IAssemblyInstance>
033    implements IContainerModelSupport<MI, NMI, FI, AI> {
034
035  @NonNull
036  private final Map<Integer, NMI> namedModelInstances;
037  @NonNull
038  private final Map<Integer, FI> fieldInstances;
039  @NonNull
040  private final Map<Integer, AI> assemblyInstances;
041
042  /**
043   * Construct an empty, mutable container.
044   */
045  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
046  public AbstractContainerModelSupport() {
047    this(
048        new LinkedHashMap<>(),
049        new LinkedHashMap<>(),
050        new LinkedHashMap<>());
051  }
052
053  /**
054   * Construct an new container using the provided collections.
055   *
056   * @param namedModelInstances
057   *          a collection of named model instances
058   * @param fieldInstances
059   *          a collection of field instances
060   * @param assemblyInstances
061   *          a collection of assembly instances
062   */
063  protected AbstractContainerModelSupport(
064      @NonNull Map<Integer, NMI> namedModelInstances,
065      @NonNull Map<Integer, FI> fieldInstances,
066      @NonNull Map<Integer, AI> assemblyInstances) {
067    this.namedModelInstances = namedModelInstances;
068    this.fieldInstances = fieldInstances;
069    this.assemblyInstances = assemblyInstances;
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public Map<Integer, NMI> getNamedModelInstanceMap() {
074    return namedModelInstances;
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public Map<Integer, FI> getFieldInstanceMap() {
079    return fieldInstances;
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public Map<Integer, AI> getAssemblyInstanceMap() {
084    return assemblyInstances;
085  }
086
087  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.EmptyFinalizer", "checkstyle:NoFinalizer" })
088  @Override
089  protected final void finalize() {
090    // Address SEI CERT Rule OBJ-11:
091    // https://wiki.sei.cmu.edu/confluence/display/java/OBJ11-J.+Be+wary+of+letting+constructors+throw+exceptions
092  }
093}
